generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, including a pedestrian crossing, which is part of the road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by curbs and poles, where pedestrians are walking, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: A large stone building with ornate architectural details and windows is visible on the right side of the image.
- fence: A metal fence with vertical bars runs along the front of the building, separating it from the sidewalk.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one holding a traffic sign and another supporting a traffic light.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible, showing a green pedestrian signal.
- traffic sign: A blue and white directional sign indicating "Wiesenhüttenstraße" and "Einbahnstraße" is mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible in the background and along the sidewalk.
- person: Two women are walking across the road, both wearing dresses and carrying bags.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the street, and the front of a car with a Mercedes-Benz emblem is visible at the bottom of the image.
